sourcesContent:
import gql from 'graphql-tag'

export const GET_POSTS_BY_CATEGORIES_QUERY = gql`
query GetBlogPostsByCategories($cat_ids: [int]) {
    posts: getPostsByCategories(cat_ids: $cat_ids) {
   id
   title
   description
   updated_at
   author
   image
   categories
    }
  } 
`
